verses.text: \w Μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w ταῦτα|strong="G3778"\w* \w εἶδον|strong="G3708"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*—\w θύρα|strong="G2374"\w* \w ἀνεῳγμένη|strong="G0455"\w*\f + \fr 4:1 \ft ανεωγμενη \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d,e⅗,f,g,hpt,i\+sup* 0169,CP,RP,HF,OC ¦ ηνεωγμενη \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e⅖,hpt\+sup* ℵA,NU,TR\f* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w οὐρανῷ|strong="G3772"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w φωνὴ|strong="G5456"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πρώτη|strong="G4413"\w* \w ἣν|strong="G1510"\w* \w ἤκουσα|strong="G0191"\w* \w ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w σάλπιγγος|strong="G4536"\w* \w λαλούσης|strong="G2980"\w* \w μετ|strong="G3326"\w*᾿ \w ἐμοῦ|strong="G1473"\w*, \w λέγουσα|strong="G3004"\w*,\f + \fr 4:1 \ft λεγουσα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅕,d,e,h¼,i⅓\+sup* CP,TR ¦ και λεγουσης \+bd M\+bd*\+sup g\+sup* ¦ λεγων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f,h,i⅔\+sup* ℵA,0169,RP,HF,OC,NU (The subject of the verb is ‘voice’, feminine.)\f* «\w Ἀνάβα|strong="G0305"\w* \w ὧδε|strong="G5602"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w δείξω|strong="G1166"\w* \w σοι|strong="G4771"\w* \w ἃ|strong="G3739"\w* \w δεῖ|strong="G1163"\w* \w γενέσθαι|strong="G1096"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w ταῦτα|strong="G3778"\w*.» The Throne Room

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w*\f + \fr 4:2 \ft και \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,d,e,g,h⅓,i\+sup* CP,RP,OC,TR ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,f,h⅔,i¼\+sup* ℵA,0169,HF,NU (OC is in small print.)\f* \w εὐθέως|strong="G2112"\w* \w ἐγενόμην|strong="G1096"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w πνεύματι|strong="G4151"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w θρόνος|strong="G2362"\w* \w ἔκειτο|strong="G2749"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w οὐρανῷ|strong="G3772"\w* (\w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w*\f + \fr 4:2 \ft του θρονου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,g¼,i⅓\+sup* CP,TR ¦ τον θρονον \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f,g,h,i⅔\+sup* ℵA,0169,RP,HF,OC,NU\f* \w καθήμενος|strong="G2521"\w*)

\w ὅμοιος|strong="G3664"\w*\f + \fr 4:3 \ft ομοιος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d,e,f,gpt,hpt,i⅗\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC ¦ και ο καθημενος 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅕,gpt,hpt,i⅓\+sup* ℵA,0169,NU ¦ και ο καθημενος ην 1 TR (I suppose the parenthetical observation that closes verse 2 got some copyists off the track, but it was the throne, not the One, that was like jasper.)\f* \w ὁράσει|strong="G3706"\w* \w λίθῳ|strong="G3037"\w*, \w ἰάσπιδι|strong="G2393"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w σαρδίῳ|strong="G4556"\w*,\f + \fr 4:3 \ft σαρδιω \+it rell\+it* ¦ σαρδινω \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e⅔\+sup* TR ¦ σαρδειω \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅓\+sup*\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἶρις|strong="G2463"\w* \w κυκλόθεν|strong="G2943"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w*, \w ὁμοία|strong="G3664"\w*\f + \fr 4:3 \ft ομοια \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,g\+sup* CP ¦ ομοιος \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,fpt,hpt,i\+sup* A,NU,TR ¦ ομοιως \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,fpt,hpt\+sup* RP,HF,OC (The adjective is modifying ‘rainbow’.)\f* \w ὁράσει|strong="G3706"\w*\f + \fr 4:3 \ft ορασει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,d,e,fpt,g,hpt,ipt\+sup* A,CP,NU,TR ¦ ορασις \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,fpt,hpt,ipt\+sup* RP,HF,OC\f* \w σμαραγδίνῳ|strong="G4664"\w*.\f + \fr 4:3 \ft σμαραγδινω \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,fpt,g,h,i\+sup* A,CP,NU,TR ¦ σμαραγδινων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,fpt\+sup* RP,HF,OC ¦ σμαραγδω \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b\+sup*\f*

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w κυκλόθεν|strong="G2943"\w*\f + \fr 4:4 \ft και κυκλοθεν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a¼,b,e,f⅔,g,h⅔,i⅔\+sup* A,CP,RP,OC,NU,TR ¦ 1 κυκλω \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d\+sup* ¦ κυκλωθεν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,f⅓,h⅓,i⅓\+sup* HF (OC is in small print.)\f* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w θρόνοι|strong="G2362"\w*\f + \fr 4:4 \ft θρονοι \+it rell\+it* ¦ θρονους \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,h⅓\+sup* NU\f* \w εἴκοσι|strong="G1501"\w* \w τέσσαρες|strong="G5064"\w*,\f + \fr 4:4 \ft εικοσι τεσσαρες \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35¼\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,d⅓,ept,f,hpt,i⅔\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ κδ΄ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,bpt,d⅓,ept,gpt,hpt\+sup* ¦ 1 και 2 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup bpt,d⅓,gpt\+sup* ℵA,TR (The split in virtually every group suggests that some factor other than conviction as to the original form was at work [especially since there is no difference in meaning]; the distribution of MSS to the three variants is roughly 40:50:10% [the abbreviation loses 15 MSS below]; the economic factor behind the use of abbreviated forms for numbers and sacred names would presumably make itself felt when copies began to be proliferated, not when the Autographs were being penned; I conclude that the abbreviation is not original.)\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνους|strong="G2362"\w* \w εἶδον|strong="G3708"\w*\f + \fr 4:4 \ft ειδον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup i⅓\+sup* CP,TR ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d,e,f,g,h,i⅔\+sup* A,RP,HF,OC,NU (Are the elders to receive separate treatment, or not? Given their prominence in what follows, probably so. Verses 2-3 are without an independent verb, so it is about time. Note also that the definite article occurs with the first mention of the elders.)\f* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w*\f + \fr 4:4 \ft τους \+it rell\+it* ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d⅔,e⅔,i⅓\+sup*\f* \w εἴκοσι|strong="G1501"\w* \w τέσσαρας|strong="G5064"\w*\f + \fr 4:4 \ft εικοσι τεσσαρας \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35¼\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,d¼,ept,f,h⅓,ipt\+sup* A,CP,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ κδ΄ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,b,dpt,e⅓,g\+sup* ¦ 1 και 2 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d¼,e¼,h\+sup* TR\f* \w πρεσβυτέρους|strong="G4245"\w* \w καθημένους|strong="G2521"\w*, \w περιβεβλημένους|strong="G4016"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w ἱματίοις|strong="G2440"\w* \w λευκοῖς|strong="G3022"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w*\f + \fr 4:4 \ft και \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 εσχον TR\f* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τὰς|strong="G3588"\w* \w κεφαλὰς|strong="G2776"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w* \w στεφάνους|strong="G4735"\w* \w χρυσοῦς|strong="G5552"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w ἐκπορεύονται|strong="G1607"\w* \w ἀστραπαὶ|strong="G0796"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w φωναὶ|strong="G5456"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w βρονταί|strong="G1027"\w*·\f + \fr 4:5 \ft φωναι και βρονται \+it rell\+it* ¦ ~ 321 TR\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἑπτὰ|strong="G2033"\w* \w λαμπάδες|strong="G2985"\w* \w πυρὸς|strong="G4442"\w* \w καιόμεναι|strong="G2545"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*,\f + \fr 4:5 \ft αυτου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d,e⅖,f,g⅔,h¼,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e⅗,g⅓,h,i¼\+sup* ℵA,OC,NU,TR\f* \w αἵ|strong="G3588"\w* \w εἰσιν|strong="G1510"\w*\f + \fr 4:5 \ft αι εισιν \+it rell\+it* ¦ α 2 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅛,e⅓\+sup* NU ¦ α εστιν A ¦ ℵ omits ten words\f* \w ἑπτὰ|strong="G2033"\w*\f + \fr 4:5 \ft επτα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e⅗,f,g⅔,h⅓,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ τα 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e⅖,h⅔\+sup* A,OC,NU,TR (Without the article the reference is presumably not to the Holy Spirit.)\f* \w πνεύματα|strong="G4151"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w*·

\w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w ὡς|strong="G5613"\w*\f + \fr 4:6 \ft ως \+it rell\+it* ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e⅔\+sup* TR ¦ αυτου 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup g\+sup*\f* \w θάλασσα|strong="G2281"\w* \w ὑαλίνη|strong="G5193"\w*,\f + \fr 4:6 \ft υαλινη \+it rell\+it* ¦ υελινη \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅙,b⅕,c¼,ept,h⅓\+sup* CP\f* \w ὁμοία|strong="G3664"\w* κρυστάλῳ.\f + \fr 4:6 \ft κρυσταλω \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅛,e⅙,g⅓,h¼\+sup* ¦ κρυσταλλω \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,c3/7,d,e,f,g⅔,h,i\+sup* ℵA,CP,RP,HF,OC,NU,TR (Although λλ→λ would presumably be easier as a transcriptional error than the reverse, in 21:12 John apparently invents the verb κρυσταλιζω, spelling it with a single ‘l’—I take it that he did the same thing with the noun, here and in 22:1, but the unusual spelling led copyists to ‘correct’ him, especially in a matter perceived to be of virtually no consequence.)\f* The four living beings \w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w μέσῳ|strong="G3319"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w κύκλῳ|strong="G2945"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w τέσσαρα|strong="G5064"\w* \w ζῷα|strong="G2226"\w* \w γέμοντα|strong="G1073"\w* \w ὀφθαλμῶν|strong="G3788"\w*, \w ἔμπροσθεν|strong="G1715"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὄπισθεν|strong="G3693"\w*.

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζῷον|strong="G2226"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πρῶτον|strong="G4412"\w* \w ὅμοιον|strong="G3664"\w* \w λέοντι|strong="G3023"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δεύτερον|strong="G1208"\w* \w ζῷον|strong="G2226"\w* \w ὅμοιον|strong="G3664"\w* \w μόσχῳ|strong="G3448"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w τρίτον|strong="G5154"\w* \w ζῷον|strong="G2226"\w* \w ἔχον|strong="G2192"\w*\f + \fr 4:7 \ft εχον \+it rell\+it* ¦ εχων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a¼,b⅓,d⅕,e⅓,f⅕,g,h⅕,i⅖\+sup* A,NU\f* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πρόσωπον|strong="G4383"\w* \w ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w ἄνθρωπος|strong="G0444"\w*,\f + \fr 4:7 \ft το (−\+bd M\+bd*\+sup g\+sup*) προσωπον ως ανθρωπος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,g,h⅔,i⅓\+sup* CP,TR ¦ 2 ανθρωπου \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e⅕,f,h⅓,i⅔\+sup* RP,HF ¦ 123 ανθρωπου A,OC,NU ¦ 123 ομοιον ανθρωπω ℵ\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w τέταρτον|strong="G5067"\w* \w ζῷον|strong="G2226"\w*\f + \fr 4:7 \ft ζωον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅕,d,e,g,h,ipt\+sup* ℵA,CP,RP,OC,NU,TR ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e⅕,f,h¼,ipt\+sup* HF\f* \w ὅμοιον|strong="G3664"\w* \w ἀετῷ|strong="G0105"\w* \w πετομένῳ|strong="G4072"\w*.\f + \fr 4:7 \ft πετομενω \+it rell\+it* ¦ πετωμενω [15 assorted mss] CP,TR\f*

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w*\f + \fr 4:8 \ft τα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅓,b,d,fpt,g,h,i⅗\+sup* ℵA,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅔,e,fpt,i⅖\+sup* CP,TR\f* \w τέσσαρα|strong="G5064"\w* \w ζῷα|strong="G2226"\w*, \w ἓν|strong="G1722"\w* \w καθ|strong="G2596"\w*᾿ \w ἓν|strong="G1722"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w*,\f + \fr 4:8 \ft εν αυτων \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e⅔,g,hpt,i⅓\+sup* ℵA,CP,OC,NU ¦ 12 εστως \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b\+sup* ¦ 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,e⅓,f,i⅔\+sup* RP,HF ¦ εαυτο TR ¦ 1 εκαστον \+bd M\+bd*\+sup hpt\+sup* ℵ\f* \w ἔχον|strong="G2192"\w*\f + \fr 4:8 \ft εχον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,bpt,d⅓,e⅗,f,h¼,i⅗\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC ¦ εχων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅕,bpt,e⅖,g,h⅕,i⅓\+sup* A,NU ¦ εχει \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d\+sup* ¦ ειχον ℵ,TR ¦ εχοντα \+bd M\+bd*\+sup hpt\+sup* (The neuter singular is correct.)\f* \w ἀνὰ|strong="G0303"\w* \w πτέρυγας|strong="G4420"\w* \w ἕξ|strong="G1537"\w*, \w κυκλόθεν|strong="G2943"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἔσωθεν|strong="G2081"\w* \w γέμουσιν|strong="G1073"\w*\f + \fr 4:8 \ft γεμουσιν \+it rell\+it* ¦ γεμοντα \+bd M\+bd*\+sup h⅓\+sup* TR\f* \w ὀφθαλμῶν|strong="G3788"\w*. \w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀνάπαυσιν|strong="G0372"\w* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἔχουσιν|strong="G2192"\w*, \w ἡμέρας|strong="G2250"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w νυκτός|strong="G3571"\w*, \w λέγοντα|strong="G3004"\w*·\f + \fr 4:8 \ft λεγοντα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup h⅓\+sup* CP,TR ¦ λεγοντες \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,c⅓,d,e,f,g,h⅔,i\+sup* ℵA,RP,HF,OC,NU (The Subject of the participle is τα ζωα, neuter, so the neuter form is correct, in spite of the slim attestation. It seems clear from verse 9 that it is only the four living beings who are repeating ‘holy’, but if copyists thought the elders were in chorus with the living beings, they would naturally change the gender to masculine. In spite of the split in \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup*, most of the better representatives of the family attest the first variant.)\f* «\w Ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*· \w Ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*· \w Ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*·\f + \fr 4:8 \ft αγιος (nine times) \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅔,b,f\+sup* (ℵ)CP,HF ¦ αγιος (three times) \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅓,d,e,g,h,i\+sup* A,RP,OC,NU,TR (Surely it is more likely that ‘nine’ would be changed to ‘three’ than vice versa; in fact, try reading ‘holy’ nine times in a row out loud—it starts to get uncomfortable! Since in the context the living ones are repeating themselves endlessly, the ‘nine’ is both appropriate and effective; three ‘holies’ for each member of the Trinity.)\f* \w Κύριος|strong="G2962"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεὸς|strong="G2316"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Παντοκράτωρ|strong="G3841"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἦν|strong="G1510"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὢν|strong="G3739"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐρχόμενος|strong="G2064"\w*.» The twenty-four elders

\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὅταν|strong="G3752"\w* \w δῶσιν|strong="G1325"\w*\f + \fr 4:9 \ft δωσιν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e⅖,f,h¼,ipt\+sup* RP,HF,OC ¦ δωσωσιν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup ept,g\+sup* ℵ ¦ δωσουσιν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅙,d,h,ipt\+sup* A,NU,TR ¦ δωσει CP\f* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζῷα|strong="G2226"\w* \w δόξαν|strong="G1391"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τιμὴν|strong="G5092"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w εὐχαριστίαν|strong="G2169"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w καθημένῳ|strong="G2521"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w*,\f + \fr 4:9 \ft του θρονου \+it rell\+it* ¦ τω θρονω ℵA[+6 mss]NU\f* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζῶντι|strong="G2198"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰῶνας|strong="G0165"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰώνων|strong="G0165"\w*,

\w πεσοῦνται|strong="G4098"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w εἴκοσι|strong="G1501"\w* \w τέσσαρες|strong="G5064"\w*\f + \fr 4:10 \ft εικοσι τεσσαρες \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35¼\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,b,d¼,ept,f,g⅓,hpt,ipt\+sup* ℵA,CP,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ κδ΄ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,d,ept,g⅔,hpt\+sup* ¦ 1 και 2 TR\f* \w πρεσβύτεροι|strong="G4245"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w καθημένου|strong="G2521"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w προσκυνήσουσιν|strong="G4352"\w*\f + \fr 4:10 \ft προσκυνησουσιν \+it rell\+it* ¦ προσκυνουσιν TR\f* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζῶντι|strong="G2198"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰῶνας|strong="G0165"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰώνων|strong="G0165"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w βαλοῦσιν|strong="G0906"\w*\f + \fr 4:10 \ft βαλουσιν \+it rell\+it* ¦ βαλλουσιν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e¼,g⅓\+sup* ℵ,CP,TR\f* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w στεφάνους|strong="G4735"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θρόνου|strong="G2362"\w* \w λέγοντες|strong="G3004"\w*·

«\w Ἄξιος|strong="G0514"\w* \w εἶ|strong="G1487"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Κύριος|strong="G2962"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεὸς|strong="G2316"\w* \w ἡμῶν|strong="G1473"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*,\f + \fr 4:11 \ft ο κυριος και ο θεος ημων ο αγιος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e⅕,f,h¼,i⅔\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ 123456 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup h⅓\+sup* A,NU ¦ 12356 ℵ,OC ¦ κυριε 456 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e⅔,g,h⅓\+sup* ¦ κυριε TR\f* \w λαβεῖν|strong="G2983"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w δόξαν|strong="G1391"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w τιμὴν|strong="G5092"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w δύναμιν|strong="G1411"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w σὺ|strong="G4771"\w* \w ἔκτισας|strong="G2936"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w*\f + \fr 4:11 \ft τα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,h,i⅓\+sup* ℵA,CP,OC,NU,TR ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e¼,f,g,h¼,i⅔\+sup* RP,HF\f* \w πάντα|strong="G3956"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w διὰ|strong="G1223"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w θέλημά|strong="G2307"\w* \w σού|strong="G4771"\w* \w εἰσιν|strong="G1510"\w*\f + \fr 4:11 \ft εισιν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,d,e,g,hpt,i⅓\+sup* CP,TR ¦ ησαν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,f,hpt,i⅔\+sup* ℵA,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ ουκ ησαν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup h⅓\+sup*\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐκτίσθησαν|strong="G2936"\w*.»
